wikipedia_page.main: Walter "Wally" Green (25 February 1918 – 11 December 2006) was an international motorcycle speedway rider who finished second in the World Championship final in 1950.

response: Notable riders were Jock Grierson, Ken Middleditch and Wally Green, who went on to race for West Ham in the First Division and was runner up in the 1950 World Final. The Pilot Field is still in use by football team Hastings United.

link_mentions.page: List of Individual Speedway World Championship medalists

response: *Wally Green, former international motorcycle speedway rider
* Wally Green (born 1918), English motorcycle speedway rider
